questions.questionLabel: What is a component in Angular?
Explain the purpose of the NgModule in Angular.
How do you create a new Angular application?
What is a component in React?
How do you manage state in a React application?
What are React hooks, and why are they useful?
What is a component in Vue?
What are directives in Vue, and how are they used?

answers.answerLabel: A reusable building block for the user interface
A style in Angular
A service for handling HTTP requests
A routing configuration
NgModule is used to declare and configure modules in Angular applications.
NgModule is a component in Angular.
NgModule is used for data binding in Angular.
NgModule is a directive in Angular.
You can create a new Angular application using the Angular CLI by running 'ng new app-name'.
You can create a new Angular application by writing HTML and CSS files.
You can create a new Angular application using pure JavaScript.
You can create a new Angular application using Python.
A reusable building block for the user interface
A style in React
A service for handling HTTP requests
A routing configuration
You can manage state in a React application using the 'useState' hook.
You can manage state in a React application using the 'useEffect' hook.
You can manage state in a React application using the 'useContext' hook.
You can manage state in a React application using the 'useReducer' hook.
React hooks are functions that let you use state and other React features without writing a class.
React hooks are used for routing in React applications.
React hooks are used for data binding in React applications.
React hooks are used for styling in React applications.
A reusable building block for the user interface
A style in Vue
A service for handling HTTP requests
A routing configuration
Directives in Vue are used to add dynamic behavior to an element.
Directives in Vue are used for styling elements.
Directives in Vue are used for routing.
Directives in Vue are used for data binding.
The Vue instance is the root of every Vue application and controls the entire application.
The Vue instance is a component in Vue.
The Vue instance is used for data binding in Vue.
